name: js-data-adapter
description: Base adapter class that all other js-data adapters extend.
author: js-data-adapter project authors

scripts.bundle_adapter: rollup -c rollup.config.js -f umd -o dist/js-data-adapter.js -m dist/js-data-adapter.js.map src/index.js
scripts.bundle_tests: rollup -c rollup-tests.config.js -f umd -o dist/js-data-adapter-tests.js -m dist/js-data-adapter-tests.js.map test/index.js
scripts.bundle: npm run bundle_adapter && npm run bundle_tests
scripts.build: npm run lint && npm run bundle
scripts.cover: nyc --require babel-core/register --require babel-polyfill --cache mocha mocha.start.js -t 20000 -R dot && nyc report --reporter=html
scripts.test: npm run build && npm run cover
scripts.release: npm test && repo-tools updates && repo-tools changelog && repo-tools authors
